shadow.name: IMPATIENCE
shadow.description: The shadow frequency of Waiting, expressing through impatience

gift.name: PATIENCE
gift.description: The gift frequency of Waiting, expressing through patience

siddhi.name: TIMELESSNESS
siddhi.description: The siddhi frequency of Waiting, expressing through timelessness

inversion_protocols.script: This is Gate 5 shadow frequency. The impatience you're experiencing is a distortion of your natural patience. Through awareness and experimentation, you can shift from impatience to patience.
inversion_protocols.somatic_anchor: Feel into your sacral. Notice the sensation of impatience.

experiment.hypothesis: If I work with Gate 5 consciously for 7 days, the impatience pattern will shift toward patience.
experiment.action: Daily practice working with Gate 5 energy.

success_criteria.target: Noticeable shift from impatience toward patience
